Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
Hey there, I have a few tasks I need to get done.  The first thing I need to do is check the status on a ride
name
May I have your name, please?
Angela.  My ride number I believe is 77
name
May I have your name, please?
Angela
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue. [instruction 2 of 6]

Events.Text: Your driver is dropping off another passenger. Is 4 minutes away
Thank you.  Now tomorrow I have to go from Forbes and Murray to Craig and Center via the bus.  Can you outline these directions so I can save them to the phone?

Events.Text: What time do you need to arrive by?
3 pm

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your driver is dropping off another passenger.

DetailedTransitInstructions: Go to the bus stop at the corner of the intersection. The stop will be in front of a barbershop.
Take the 28X to Forbes and Atwood. You will travel 8 stops and it will take 15 minutes.
Walk in the same direction as the bus for 1 block. You will pass a school on your right.
Cross the street at the football field and immediately turn left.
Your destination will be on the right and you should see a McDonalds beside it.

Events.Text: It will be Sunny all day on Friday in San Francisco, with temperatures of around 28 degrees celsius.
Ah nice weather.  Cool.  Ok finally I need to schedule a meeting on Tuesday
guest
With whom would you like to schedule the meeting?
Mr. Rogers.  Kind of a goof but means well
Mr. Fred Rogers? And what is the start time of the meeting?
Mr Fred Rogers? And you meeting start time?
Indeed you know him!  Always wearing that sweater... anyways let's shoot for 2pm

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Angela

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 83)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from 'Craig and Center' to 'Forbes and Murray') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. Detroit or Detroit)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
